channel.title: Is Near Reality (Shard) a good server base? to improve and host
channel.description: let me know :P i want to use a source that has already some content in it but i want to add more stuff :P will i be able to host this without any lags?

item.title: Is Near Reality (Shard) a good server base? to improve and host
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“loruviam, post:3, topic:540501”][quote author=sertan8 link=topic=659361.msg4409527#msg4409527 date=1393096070]
might lag if your new content comes with sloppy codes
[/quote]

alright thanks but, is shard hard to code or it’s like project insanity? well i know it’s different but is it harder? since I moved from PI, PI isnt stable at all :x[/quote]
Shard is a pretty stable base, more so than PI for sure… but it all comes down to the content you add AFTER you download it…

Read full topic
item.source: Is Near Reality (Shard) a good server base? to improve and host
